title: Trust in GenAI Requires an Open Data Movement Platform
author: Michel Tricot
description: A data movement platform based on open source is the only way to ensure that all the right data is easily accessible to AI models that will guide impactful decisions to take your business forward.
cntitle: 信任 GenAI 需要一个开放数据运动平台
cndescription: 基于开源的数据移动平台是确保所有正确的数据都能轻松供人工智能模型访问的唯一途径，而人工智能模型将指导影响深远的决策，推动您的业务向前发展。
